example: Our train is scheduled to depart from Platform 3 at 9:30 AM sharp.
example_zh: 我們的火車預定於早上 9 點半準時從三號月台出發。

example: If you plan to stay for three months, you will need to apply for a tourist visa.
example_zh: 如果您計畫停留三個月，您需要申請觀光簽證。

example: We have arranged your accommodation near the conference center for the duration of the meeting.
example_zh: 我們已經安排好您在會議期間靠近會議中心的住宿。

example: Please check the monitor to confirm the estimated time of arrival for your connecting flight.
example_zh: 請查看螢幕以確認您轉機航班的預計抵達時間。

example: Many companies offer opportunities to work abroad for six months to gain valuable experience.
example_zh: 許多公司提供到國外工作六個月以獲取寶貴經驗的機會。

example: We need to check in our heavy luggage before going through security at the airport.
example_zh: 在通過機場安檢之前，我們需要托運我們沉重的行李。

example: Did you remember to book the flights for our business conference next month?
example_zh: 你記得預訂我們下個月商務會議的機票了嗎？

example: Our final destination is Paris, but we have a short layover in Frankfurt.
example_zh: 我們的最終目的地是巴黎，但我們會在法蘭克福短暫停留。

example: Please confirm your reservation details by email before Friday morning.
example_zh: 請在週五早上之前透過電子郵件確認您的預訂詳情。

example: The area near the beach is very crowded with tourists during the summer season.
example_zh: 在夏季，海灘附近的地區擠滿了觀光客。

example: I need to confirm my hotel reservation before leaving for the business trip next week.
example_zh: 下週出差前，我需要確認我的飯店預訂。

example: Please keep an eye on your luggage while waiting at the station.
example_zh: 在車站等候時，請留意您的行李。

example: Our team reviewed the entire travel itinerary to make sure we didn't miss any important meetings.
example_zh: 我們的團隊審閱了整個旅遊行程，以確保我們沒有錯過任何重要的會議。

example: You must show your boarding pass and ID at the gate before getting on the plane.
example_zh: 登機前，您必須在登機門出示您的登機證和證件。

example: What is your final destination after the connecting flight in Tokyo?
example_zh: 在東京轉機之後，您的最終目的地是哪裡？

example: Good attendance is required if you want to pass the advanced management course.
example_zh: 如果你想通過這個進階管理課程，則必須保持良好的出席率。

example: We have a challenging writing assignment due next Monday, so please start early.
example_zh: 我們有一份具挑戰性的寫作作業下週一截止，所以請提早開始。

example: The new science building will be located on the north side of the main campus.
example_zh: 新的科學大樓將會位於主校園的北側。

example: You must enroll in your preferred electives before the deadline this Friday.
example_zh: 你必須在本週五截止日期前註冊你偏好的選修課。

example: The school updated its curriculum to include more practical digital skills training.
example_zh: 學校更新了其課程總綱，加入了更多實用的數位技能培訓。

example: It is important to be punctual for every meeting, seminar, and presentation.
example_zh: 對於每一次會議、研討會和簡報來說，準時非常重要。

example: The professor spent the whole weekend grading the mid-term examinations for his large class.
example_zh: 這位教授花了一整個週末為他大班級學生的期中考試評分。

example: I found the guest speaker's lecture on global economic trends extremely interesting.
example_zh: 我覺得那位嘉賓講者關於全球經濟趨勢的講座極其有趣。

example: She applied for a scholarship to help cover the high tuition fees for graduate school.
example_zh: 她申請了獎學金，以幫助支付研究所高昂的學費。

example: The university library facility offers 24-hour access to registered students during exam week.
example_zh: 大學圖書館設施在考試週期間向註冊學生提供 24 小時的服務。

example: I usually commute by train, which takes about forty minutes every morning.
example_zh: 我通常搭火車通勤，每天早上大約需要四十分鐘。

example: We need to set a monthly budget to control our spending on groceries.
example_zh: 我們需要設定一個每月預算來控制我們的雜貨開支。

example: Always keep your receipt in case you need to return the item later this week.
example_zh: 永遠保留你的收據，以防你本週稍後需要退貨。

example: I have to run a few errands this afternoon, mainly grocery shopping and mailing a letter.
example_zh: 我今天下午必須跑幾個腿，主要是買菜和寄信。

example: Following a strict morning routine helps me start my day productively and on time.
example_zh: 遵守嚴格的早晨慣例有助於我高效率地準時開始一天。

example: The new manager is very efficient at organizing meetings and saving time.
example_zh: 新經理在組織會議和節省時間方面非常有效率。

example: I need to schedule a doctor's appointment before the end of next month.
example_zh: 我需要在下個月底前預定一個醫生的門診。

example: They are looking for a car that is both reliable and affordable for their family.
example_zh: 他們正在尋找一輛對他們家庭而言既可靠又負擔得起的汽車。

example: Please make sure all job applications are submitted before the Friday deadline.
example_zh: 請確保所有工作申請都在週五截止日期前提交。

example: Our washing machine, a major home appliance, broke down yesterday morning.
example_zh: 我們的主要家用電器——洗衣機，昨天早上壞了。

example: You need a valid entry visa before booking your flight to that country.
example_zh: 在預訂前往那個國家的航班前，你需要有效的入境簽證。

example: Please confirm your departure time and check the gate number on the monitor.
example_zh: 請確認您的出發時間，並查看螢幕上的登機門號碼。

example: We must ensure our checked luggage is under the weight limit specified by the airline.
example_zh: 我們必須確保我們的托運行李在航空公司規定的重量限制內。

example: Do you have a reservation under the name Johnson for a double room tonight?
example_zh: 您今晚是否有以約翰遜（Johnson）的名字預訂雙人房？

example: Our final destination for the business trip is the main office in Tokyo.
example_zh: 我們這次商務旅行的最終目的地是位於東京的總辦公室。

example: We need to check in at the hotel before 5 PM because the front desk closes early.
example_zh: 我們需要在下午五點前到飯店辦理入住手續，因為櫃台會提早關閉。

example: Check the current exchange rate before you decide to convert a large amount of money.
example_zh: 在你決定兌換大量現金之前，請先查看目前的匯率。

example: Due to unexpected maintenance, there was a two-hour flight delay this morning.
example_zh: 由於突發的維護作業，今天早上的航班延誤了兩個小時。

example: The resort offers excellent amenities, including a gym, spa, and free laundry service.
example_zh: 這間度假村提供極好的設施，包括健身房、水療中心和免費洗衣服務。

example: We plan to spend the afternoon sightseeing around the historical monuments in the city center.
example_zh: 我們計劃花費下午的時間在市中心的歷史古蹟周圍觀光。

example: I need to separate the white clothes from the colored ones before starting the laundry.
example_zh: 開始洗衣服前，我需要將白色衣物和彩色衣物分開。

example: Please call the dental office to reschedule your morning appointment for next week.
example_zh: 請致電牙科診所，將您早上的預約改期到下週。

example: After working twelve hours straight, the delivery driver felt completely exhausted.
example_zh: 連續工作十二小時後，這位送貨司機感到徹底精疲力盡。

example: I often turn off social media notifications so I can focus on my studies.
example_zh: 我經常關閉社交媒體通知，這樣我才能專注於我的學業。

example: We need to stick to our monthly budget if we want to save enough money for the trip.
example_zh: 如果我們想存夠錢去旅行，我們就需要堅持我們的每月預算。

example: Please make sure your carry-on luggage fits under the seat or in the overhead compartment.
example_zh: 請確認您的隨身行李能放在座位下方或頭頂置物櫃中。

example: I need to confirm my hotel reservation for three nights before the end of the day.
example_zh: 我需要在今天結束前確認我三晚的飯店預訂。

example: Our final destination is Paris, but we have a short layover in Frankfurt.
example_zh: 我們的最終目的地是巴黎，但我們會在法蘭克福短暫停留。

example: We must check in online 24 hours before our flight to choose our seats.
example_zh: 我們必須在航班起飛前 24 小時在線辦理登機以選擇座位。

example: Finding suitable accommodations near the conference center was challenging this year.
example_zh: 今年要在會議中心附近找到合適的住宿很有挑戰性。

example: Please check the course schedule before deciding which classes to take next semester.
example_zh: 請在決定下學期修哪門課之前檢查一下課程表。

example: My favorite subject in middle school was science because I enjoy doing experiments.
example_zh: 我在國中時最喜歡的科目是自然科學，因為我喜歡做實驗。

example: The college campus is very large, so students often ride bicycles between buildings.
example_zh: 這座大學校園非常大，所以學生經常騎自行車往返於建築物之間。

example: Students should actively participate in group projects to improve teamwork skills.
example_zh: 學生應該積極參與小組專案，以提升團隊合作技能。

example: The history teacher gave us a challenging research assignment due next Friday morning.
example_zh: 歷史老師給了我們一項具挑戰性的研究作業，下週五早上截止。

example: The company offers a competitive salary and excellent benefits to new hires.
example_zh: 這間公司提供有競爭力的薪水和優渥的福利給新進員工。

example: We need to set up a quick meeting to discuss the project deadline tomorrow morning.
example_zh: 我們需要設定一個快速會議，來討論明天早上的專案截止日期。

example: If you want the management position, you must apply before the end of the month.
example_zh: 如果你想要這個管理職位，你必須在本月底前申請。

example: Using the new software makes the whole team much more efficient at processing data.
example_zh: 使用新軟體使整個團隊處理數據的效率更高。

example: Check your work schedule to make sure you know when your shift starts next week.
example_zh: 檢查你的工作行程表，確認你下週的輪班是何時開始。

example: I need a few days to fully recover from the flu before going back to work.
example_zh: 我需要幾天時間從流感中完全康復，然後才能回去工作。

example: If you have a fever or sore throat, those are common symptoms of the cold.
example_zh: 如果你有發燒或喉嚨痛，這些是感冒的常見症狀。

example: Good nutrition is essential for maintaining high energy levels throughout the day.
example_zh: 良好的營養對於維持一整天的高能量水平至關重要。

example: Managing a busy project schedule can be very stressful for the whole team.
example_zh: 管理一個繁忙的專案時間表對整個團隊來說壓力會非常大。

example: The doctor confirmed that the sports injury required weeks of physical therapy.
example_zh: 醫生證實這項運動傷害需要數週的物理治療。

example: My morning commute was terrible today because of the heavy rain.
example_zh: 我的早晨通勤因為大雨而糟透了。

example: Let's grab coffee soon to catch up on what you have been doing recently.
example_zh: 我們找個時間喝咖啡，聊聊你最近在忙些什麼。

example: How are you managing the transition to the new remote work schedule?
example_zh: 你如何應對轉變為新的遠距工作時間表？

zh: 悲慘的；陰鬱的 (常形容天氣)
example: The weather has been absolutely miserable, making me want to stay inside all day.
example_zh: 天氣一直很陰鬱，讓我一整天都想待在室內。

example: Could you give me a quick update on the progress of the current marketing campaign?
example_zh: 你能快速地告訴我目前行銷活動的進度嗎？

example: I need to check my weekly schedule to see if I have time for a dental appointment.
example_zh: 我需要查看我的每週行程表，確認是否有時間去看牙醫。

example: Could you please run a quick errand to the post office before lunch?
example_zh: 你能在午飯前幫我跑一趟郵局嗎？

example: Our washing machine, which is a key household appliance, broke down yesterday.
example_zh: 我們的洗衣機，這個重要的家用電器，昨天壞掉了。

example: After working 10 hours straight, I felt completely exhausted and went straight to bed.
example_zh: 連續工作 10 小時後，我感到筋疲力盡，直接上床睡覺了。

example: Since moving outside the city, I now commute almost two hours every day.
example_zh: 自從搬到市區外，我現在每天通勤將近兩個小時。

example: I called the hotel to confirm my reservation for the two-night business trip.
example_zh: 我打電話給飯店確認我兩晚商務旅行的預訂。

example: Our final destination for the summer vacation is a quiet, remote island.
example_zh: 我們暑假旅行的最終目的地是一個安靜偏遠的島嶼。

example: You must show your boarding pass and photo ID when you get to the security checkpoint.
example_zh: 抵達安全檢查站時，您必須出示登機證和附照片的證件。

example: Remember to pack warm clothes because the weather at night will be cold.
example_zh: 記得打包保暖衣物，因為晚上的天氣會很冷。

example: We plan to spend the first day of our trip sightseeing and visiting historical spots.
example_zh: 我們計劃在旅行的第一天進行觀光並參觀歷史景點。

example: My favorite subject in high school was history, but I struggled with math.
example_zh: 我高中最喜歡的科目是歷史，但我數學很吃力。

example: Students need to prepare for the final presentation which is scheduled for next week.
example_zh: 學生需要為下週預定的期末報告做準備。

example: Please submit the writing assignment to the online portal before midnight on Friday.
example_zh: 請在週五午夜前，將寫作作業提交至線上平台。

example: The university campus is large, so they provide regular shuttle bus services.
example_zh: 這座大學校園很大，所以他們提供定期的接駁車服務。

example: Attendance at the orientation workshop is mandatory for all new employees and interns.
example_zh: 所有新員工和實習生都必須強制參加迎新研討會。

example: My morning routine includes jogging for 30 minutes before having breakfast.
example_zh: 我的晨間例行事務包括慢跑 30 分鐘，然後吃早餐。

example: I need to stop by the supermarket after work to pick up some groceries.
example_zh: 我下班後需要順道去超市買些雜貨。

example: Having a laundromat near my apartment is very convenient for washing large items.
example_zh: 公寓附近有自助洗衣店，對洗大件物品來說非常方便。

example: We have to stick to a strict monthly budget to save money for our vacation.
example_zh: 我們必須嚴守每月的預算，才能為我們的假期存錢。

example: Please call the dentist's office to confirm your appointment for tomorrow morning.
example_zh: 請致電牙醫診所，確認你明天早上的預約。

example: Please make sure your checked luggage is labeled clearly before you drop it off.
example_zh: 在您托運行李之前，請確保您的托運行李貼有清晰的標籤。

example: We need to reserve a window seat for the long flight to Tokyo next month.
example_zh: 下個月飛往東京的長途航班，我們需要預訂一個靠窗的座位。

example: Bali is a popular tourist destination because of its beautiful beaches and temples.
example_zh: 峇里島是一個受歡迎的旅遊目的地，因為它有美麗的海灘和寺廟。

example: You should check the exchange rate before converting your local currency into US dollars.
example_zh: 在將您的當地貨幣兌換成美元之前，您應該先查看匯率。

example: Did you confirm your flight schedule and hotel check-in time yesterday?
example_zh: 您昨天確認了您的航班時刻表和飯店入住時間了嗎？

example: I checked my class schedule to see which room the math lecture was in this morning.
example_zh: 我查看了我的課表，確認今天早上數學課在哪個教室。

example: You must enroll in the advanced coding course before the registration period ends next week.
example_zh: 您必須在下週註冊期限結束前報名參加這個進階編程課程。

example: The professor reminded us that the deadline for submitting the final paper is midnight on Friday.
example_zh: 教授提醒我們，提交期末報告的截止日期是週五午夜。

example: All students at the middle school are required to wear a dark blue uniform every day.
example_zh: 這所中學的所有學生都被要求每天穿著深藍色制服。

example: The best way to improve your English speaking skills is to actively participate in class discussions.
example_zh: 提高英語口語能力的最佳方法是積極參與課堂討論。

example: I need to complete this specific task before leaving the office today.
example_zh: 我需要在今天離開辦公室前完成這個特定的任務。

example: Please schedule a meeting with the overseas client next Tuesday morning.
example_zh: 請安排一個下週二早上的會議與海外客戶見面。

example: Many applicants consider the starting salary when applying for a new engineering job.
example_zh: 許多申請者在應徵新的工程職位時會考慮起薪。

example: She applied for a management position in the marketing department last week.
example_zh: 她上週申請了行銷部門的一個管理職位。

example: We must work together as a team to achieve our quarterly sales goals.
example_zh: 我們必須以團隊形式合作，才能達成我們的季度銷售目標。

example: I need to pick up some groceries at the supermarket after work today.
example_zh: 我今天下班後需要去超市採購一些雜貨。

example: Please apologize to your neighbor for making so much noise late last night.
example_zh: 請向你的鄰居道歉，因為你昨晚太晚發出很多噪音。

example: I usually do my laundry every Sunday morning to prepare for the coming week.
example_zh: 我通常在每個週日早上洗衣服，為接下來的一週做準備。

example: After working twelve hours straight, the manager was completely exhausted.
example_zh: 連續工作十二小時後，經理完全筋疲力盡了。

example: Check the class schedule to see which lecture room we should go to next.
example_zh: 確認一下課程表，看看我們接下來應該去哪個演講廳。

example: Don't forget to bring your passport when you travel abroad.
example_zh: 出國旅行時別忘了帶護照。

example: Please confirm the flight reservation details before we finalize the payment.
example_zh: 在我們確認付款前，請先確認航班預訂的細節。

example: Our final destination on this business trip is Milan, Italy.
example_zh: 這次出差我們最終的目的是義大利米蘭。

example: The bus will depart from Gate 5 in ten minutes, so please hurry up.
example_zh: 巴士將在十分鐘後從五號門啟程，請加快腳步。

example: You should exchange some local currency before leaving the airport tomorrow.
example_zh: 你應該在明天離開機場前兌換一些當地貨幣。

example: I need to check my class schedule before registering for the afternoon course.
example_zh: 在註冊下午的課程之前，我需要查看我的課表。

example: My favorite subject this semester is history because the professor is very engaging.
example_zh: 我這學期最喜歡的科目是歷史，因為教授非常引人入勝。

example: If you attend every lecture, you will likely understand the material better.
example_zh: 如果你出席每一場講座，你可能會更好地理解教材。

example: The school principal announced that the summer vacation will start two weeks earlier.
example_zh: 校長宣布暑假將提早兩週開始。

example: All high school students must wear the standard school uniform every day.
example_zh: 所有高中生每天都必須穿著標準的學校制服。

example: The team needs to schedule a meeting to discuss the new marketing strategy.
example_zh: 團隊需要安排一次會議來討論新的行銷策略。

example: I decided to apply for the position because I have the required skills.
example_zh: 我決定申請這個職位，因為我具備所需技能。

example: We must finish the presentation before the project deadline next Friday.
example_zh: 我們必須在下週五的專案截止日期前完成簡報。

example: I asked my colleague for help with the complex spreadsheet data.
example_zh: 我向我的同事尋求協助處理複雜的試算表資料。

example: Please submit the weekly progress report to the manager by noon today.
example_zh: 請在今天中午前將每週進度報告提交給經理。

example: It might take him a few days to fully recover from the flu and return to the office.
example_zh: 他可能需要幾天才能從流感中完全恢復並回到辦公室。

example: If you experience any severe symptoms, please call the emergency hotline immediately.
example_zh: 如果您遇到任何嚴重症狀，請立即撥打緊急熱線。

example: Eating a variety of nutritious foods is essential for maintaining a strong immune system.
example_zh: 食用各種營養豐富的食物對於維持強健的免疫系統至關重要。

example: The key to long-term wellness is to consistently maintain healthy habits.
example_zh: 長期健康安適的關鍵是持續保持健康的習慣。

example: We are waiting for the laboratory results before the doctor can confirm the final diagnosis.
example_zh: 我們正在等待實驗室結果，之後醫生才能確認最終的診斷。

example: Let's grab coffee next week to catch up on everything we missed.
example_zh: 下週我們找個時間喝咖啡，聊聊我們錯過的所有事情吧。

example: It's quite chilly outside today, so you might need a heavy coat.
example_zh: 今天外面很冷，所以你可能需要一件厚外套。

example: Do you have an update on the budget proposal that we discussed yesterday?
example_zh: 關於我們昨天討論的預算提案，你有最新消息嗎？

example: Asking about someone's hobby is a good way to start a relaxed conversation.
example_zh: 詢問某人的嗜好是開始輕鬆對話的好方法。

example: I definitely agree that the new project deadline should be extended until Friday.
example_zh: 我完全同意新專案的截止日期應該延到週五。

example: I need to organize my desk before starting the new project next week.
example_zh: 下週開始新專案前，我需要整理一下我的書桌。

example: Do you have an appointment with the dentist this afternoon, or should we reschedule?
example_zh: 你今天下午有預約看牙醫嗎？還是我們應該改期？

example: After working twelve hours straight, the delivery driver felt completely exhausted.
example_zh: 連續工作十二小時後，這位送貨司機感到筋疲力盡。

example: You must prioritize the most urgent tasks before moving on to the smaller details.
example_zh: 在處理小細節之前，你必須優先處理最緊急的任務。

example: We usually buy groceries every Sunday afternoon to prepare for the coming week.
example_zh: 我們通常在每個週日下午採買食品雜貨，為接下來的一週做準備。

example: Please make sure your carry-on luggage fits under the seat or in the overhead compartment.
example_zh: 請確保您的隨身行李能放在座位下方或頭頂置物櫃中。

example: We need to book the train tickets at least two weeks before our scheduled holiday.
example_zh: 我們需要在預定假期前至少兩週預訂火車票。

example: The gate agent announced that the flight departure time would be delayed due to weather.
example_zh: 登機門服務員宣布，由於天氣原因，航班出發時間將會延遲。

example: Finding suitable accommodation is the most important step when planning an international business trip.
example_zh: 尋找合適的住宿是規劃國際商務旅行時最重要的一步。

example: I checked the itinerary again to confirm our scheduled meetings and sightseeing activities.
example_zh: 我再次查看了行程表，以確認我們預定的會議和觀光活動。

example: I need to check the class schedule to see which room the lesson is in.
example_zh: 我需要查看課程表，看看課程在哪個教室。

example: Sarah worked hard and received a high grade on her final science exam.
example_zh: 莎拉很努力，她的期末科學考試得了高分。

example: Students are encouraged to participate actively in group discussions during class time.
example_zh: 鼓勵學生在課堂上積極參與小組討論。

example: Wearing a school uniform helps all the students feel like they are part of a team.
example_zh: 穿校服有助於所有學生感覺自己是團隊的一份子。

example: We spent the whole weekend finishing the history project that is due tomorrow.
example_zh: 我們花了一整個週末完成明天到期的歷史專案。

example: Please complete this important task before the end of the day.
example_zh: 請在今天結束前完成這項重要的任務。

example: We must finish the project report by the Friday deadline.
example_zh: 我們必須在週五的截止日期前完成專案報告。

example: She performs her duties very well and always meets expectations.
example_zh: 她把職責執行得非常好，總是達到預期。

example: Check the meeting schedule to confirm the time and location.
example_zh: 請檢查會議行程表以確認時間和地點。

example: I asked my colleague for help with the new software installation.
example_zh: 我請我的同事幫忙安裝新的軟體。

example: If you have serious symptoms like a high fever, you should see a doctor immediately.
example_zh: 如果你有像高燒這樣的嚴重症狀，應該立刻去看醫生。

example: Eating a balanced diet with lots of vegetables is important for long-term health.
example_zh: 攝取大量蔬菜的均衡飲食對長期健康很重要。

example: After a stressful week at work, I need to relax by reading a book or listening to music.
example_zh: 經過一週緊張的工作後，我需要透過閱讀或聽音樂來放鬆。

example: The nurse reminded me that I must get a new prescription before the medicine runs out.
example_zh: 護士提醒我，在藥吃完之前必須拿到新的處方籤。

example: He took two weeks off work to fully recover from the minor surgery.
example_zh: 他請了兩週的假，以從這個小手術中完全康復。

example: What did you do over the weekend? I hope you had some time to relax.
example_zh: 你週末做了什麼？我希望你有時間放鬆。

example: You look very happy. Did you hear some exciting news about the sales project?
example_zh: 你看起來很高興。你有聽到關於銷售專案的令人興奮的消息嗎？

example: We haven't talked in months. Let's catch up over lunch sometime next week.
example_zh: 我們已經好幾個月沒講話了。下週找時間一起吃午餐聊聊近況吧。

example: The high humidity is making it feel much warmer today, even though the temperature is mild.
example_zh: 高濕度讓今天感覺暖和得多，儘管氣溫並不高。

example: It was a true pleasure to finally meet you in person and discuss the details of the contract.
example_zh: 很榮幸終於能與你本人見面並討論合約的細節。

example: I can't afford to buy that new smart phone right now, maybe I will wait until the sale.
example_zh: 我現在負擔不起買那支新智慧型手機，也許我會等到特價。

example: The price of the groceries at the new supermarket seems quite reasonable compared to others.
example_zh: 新超市的雜貨價格與其他地方相比，看起來相當合理。

example: You should apologize immediately for missing the team meeting without giving any notice.
example_zh: 你應該馬上為你沒有事先告知就缺席團隊會議而道歉。

example: Balancing work and family commitments is often challenging for working parents today.
example_zh: 對現今的職業父母來說，平衡工作與家庭義務通常很具挑戰性。

example: I turned off all the phone notifications so I could concentrate fully on my studies this evening.
example_zh: 我關閉了所有手機通知，以便今晚能完全專注於我的學習。

example: I need a larger suitcase because I always pack too many clothes for my week-long business trips.
example_zh: 我需要一個更大的行李箱，因為我一週的商務旅行總是打包太多衣服。

example: Please double-check the hotel reservation details to ensure everything is correct for our stay.
example_zh: 請仔細核對旅館的預訂細節，以確保我們入住的一切都正確無誤。

example: We plan to rent a scooter so we can explore the remote beaches and villages near the coast.
example_zh: 我們計畫租一輛摩托車，這樣我們就可以探索海岸附近偏遠的海灘和村莊。

example: Before leaving, I stopped at the bank to exchange some local currency for my upcoming international journey.
example_zh: 在離開之前，我先去了銀行兌換一些當地貨幣，為我即將到來的國際旅程做準備。

example: The itinerary shows a long transit period, meaning we will have plenty of time to find the connecting gate.
example_zh: 行程表顯示有一段很長的過境時間，這意味著我們將有足夠的時間找到轉機閘口。

example: Check your class schedule carefully so you don't miss the first lesson.
example_zh: 請仔細核對你的課表，以免錯過第一堂課。

example: The professor gave us a challenging research assignment due next Friday.
example_zh: 教授給了我們一個有挑戰性的研究作業，下週五截止。

example: You need to complete all the forms before you can formally enroll in the college.
example_zh: 在正式進入該學院就讀前，你需要填完所有表格。

example: My favorite subject in high school was history, but I always struggled with math.
example_zh: 我高中最喜歡的科目是歷史，但我數學一直很吃力。

example: The principal announced new guidelines to improve student safety during the upcoming school year.
example_zh: 校長宣布了新指南，以改善新學年期間的學生安全。

example: Finishing this specific task is the most important goal for the team today.
example_zh: 完成這項特定任務是團隊今天最重要的目標。

example: I need to apply for that promotion before the deadline at the end of the month.
example_zh: 我需要在月底的截止日期前申請那個升職機會。

example: The new employee was very happy with the competitive starting salary offered by the company.
example_zh: 這位新員工對公司提供的有競爭力的起薪非常滿意。

example: We must meet the strict project deadline, so we have to work efficiently this week.
example_zh: 我們必須趕上嚴格的專案截止日期，所以這週必須有效地工作。

example: Please send your final sales report directly to your department manager by noon.
example_zh: 請在中午前將您的最終銷售報告直接發給您的部門經理。

example: Regular exercise is important for maintaining a good weight and strong heart.
example_zh: 規律運動對於維持良好體重和強健心臟很重要。

example: If you want to improve your energy, focus on good nutrition and adequate sleep.
example_zh: 如果你想提升精力，請專注於良好的營養和充足的睡眠。

example: High levels of work stress can seriously affect your physical and mental health.
example_zh: 高度的工作壓力會嚴重影響你的身體和心理健康。

example: He needed three weeks to recover fully after the serious operation.
example_zh: 經過那次大手術後，他需要三週才能完全康復。

example: Please describe your symptoms carefully so the doctor can provide the correct diagnosis.
example_zh: 請仔細描述你的症狀，以便醫生提供正確的診斷。

example: It’s a lovely day today. I hope we can go for a walk after work.
example_zh: 今天天氣真好。我希望下班後我們可以去散步。

example: We should definitely catch up next week and discuss your new project.
example_zh: 我們下週一定要聚一聚，討論你的新專案。

example: Do you have any update on the sales figures from the last quarter?
example_zh: 關於上個季度的銷售數據，你有任何最新消息嗎？

example: I actually prefer to work from home on Fridays if that’s okay with the team.
example_zh: 實際上，如果團隊同意的話，我比較喜歡週五在家工作。

example: What kind of hobby do you enjoy outside of your daily work routine?
example_zh: 在你的日常工作之外，你喜歡什麼樣的嗜好？

example: I usually commute to work by subway because the traffic is terrible in the morning.
example_zh: 我通常搭地鐵通勤去上班，因為早上的交通很糟。

example: Please keep your receipt if you want to exchange the item later this week.
example_zh: 如果你這週稍後想換貨，請保留收據。

example: We are looking for an affordable apartment that is close to the city center.
example_zh: 我們正在尋找一間靠近市中心且價格負擔得起的公寓。

example: Doing laundry is my least favorite household chore, but it has to be done weekly.
example_zh: 洗衣服是我最不喜歡的家事，但它每週都必須完成。

example: I need a quiet weekend alone to completely recharge and prepare for the next busy week.
example_zh: 我需要一個安靜的獨自週末來徹底恢復精力，為下一個忙碌的一週做準備。

example: I called the hotel to confirm my reservation for next weekend's business trip.
example_zh: 我打電話給飯店確認我下週末商務旅行的訂房。

example: Please make sure your checked luggage does not exceed the weight limit for the flight.
example_zh: 請確認您的托運行李沒有超過該航班的重量限制。

example: Passengers flying to London should prepare to board the plane at Gate 12 soon.
example_zh: 飛往倫敦的乘客應準備好在 12 號登機門登機。

example: Before traveling, you must check if you need a tourist visa for your destination country.
example_zh: 旅行前，你必須確認前往你的目的地國家是否需要觀光簽證。

example: The gate agent announced that the departure time has been delayed due to bad weather conditions.
example_zh: 登機門服務人員宣布出發時間因惡劣天氣狀況已被延遲。

example: You must submit the history assignment before Friday morning.
example_zh: 你必須在星期五早上之前提交歷史作業。

example: The principal announced that the school fair would be postponed.
example_zh: 校長宣布學校園遊會將會延期。

example: My favorite subject in school is literature because I love reading novels.
example_zh: 我在學校最喜歡的科目是文學，因為我喜歡閱讀小說。

example: New students need to register for classes during the first week of August.
example_zh: 新生需要在八月的第一週註冊選課。

example: The professor’s lecture on economics lasted for nearly two hours.
example_zh: 教授關於經濟學的講座持續了將近兩個小時。

example: We have a team meeting every Monday morning to discuss the project status.
example_zh: 我們每週一早上都有一次團隊會議，討論專案進度。

example: She worked hard to achieve all her sales goals this quarter.
example_zh: 她努力工作，以實現本季度的所有銷售目標。

example: Please submit your monthly sales report to the manager by Friday.
example_zh: 請在週五前將您的月度銷售報告提交給經理。

zh: 負責任的；職責範圍內的
example: I am responsible for managing all the client accounts in the eastern region.
example_zh: 我負責管理東部地區所有客戶帳戶。

example: We must finish writing the proposal before the strict deadline next week.
example_zh: 我們必須在下週嚴格的截止日期前完成提案的撰寫。

example: If you have a persistent cough, it could be a symptom of a cold or flu.
example_zh: 如果你持續咳嗽，那可能是感冒或流感的症狀。

example: It is important to rest well so your body can recover quickly after the illness.
example_zh: 充分休息很重要，這樣你的身體才能在生病後快速康復。

example: We should pay attention to good nutrition when planning our weekly meals.
example_zh: 我們在計劃每週餐點時，應該注重良好的營養。

example: Try to find ways to relax if you find your work environment stressful lately.
example_zh: 如果你覺得最近的工作環境壓力很大，試著找方法放鬆。

example: The doctor gave me a prescription for the antibiotics I need to take.
example_zh: 醫生給了我需要服用的抗生素處方。

example: I need to catch up with my colleague after the long holiday break.
example_zh: 長假結束後，我需要和我的同事們交流一下近況。

example: We all appreciate some downtime after completing a difficult project deadline.
example_zh: 在完成一個艱難的專案期限之後，我們都很珍惜一些休息時間。

example: The weather forecast says we will have a relatively mild winter this year.
example_zh: 天氣預報說，今年冬天將會相對溫和。

example: It is important to engage with others during networking events to make connections.
example_zh: 在人脈建立活動中與他人互動交流是很重要的。

example: My daily commute takes about forty-five minutes, which is long but manageable.
example_zh: 我每天通勤大約四十五分鐘，雖然很長但還可以應付。

example: Doing the laundry is my least favorite household chore.
example_zh: 洗衣服是我最不喜歡做的家事。

example: We need to pay the monthly utility bill before the due date.
example_zh: 我們必須在截止日期前繳納每月的水電煤等公用事業費用。

example: I need to prioritize my errands this morning to save time.
example_zh: 我今天早上需要優先處理我的雜事以節省時間。

example: Please keep your receipt in case you need to return the item.
example_zh: 請保留您的收據，以防萬一需要退貨。

example: After working ten hours straight, I felt completely exhausted.
example_zh: 連續工作十小時後，我感覺筋疲力盡。

example: The new grocery store is very convenient because it is close to my office.
example_zh: 這家新的雜貨店非常方便，因為它離我的辦公室很近。

example: Doing laundry is usually my least favorite household chore on the weekend.
example_zh: 洗衣服通常是我週末最不喜歡做的家務事。

example: We need to set a strict monthly budget to save money for our vacation next year.
example_zh: 我們需要設定嚴格的每月預算，以便為明年的假期存錢。

example: You might need to negotiate the price before buying a used car.
example_zh: 在購買二手車之前，你可能需要協商價格。

example: If the refrigerator appliance breaks down, we will have to buy a replacement immediately.
example_zh: 如果冰箱電器壞了，我們將必須立即購買替換品。

example: We should reserve our flight tickets and the rental car early to get a better price.
example_zh: 我們應該提早預訂機票和租車，以獲得更好的價格。

example: Please make sure your suitcase is under 20 kilograms before checking in at the airport counter.
example_zh: 在機場櫃檯報到前，請確保您的行李箱重量低於 20 公斤。

example: We spent the whole afternoon sightseeing, visiting all the famous historical landmarks of the city.
example_zh: 我們花了一整個下午觀光，參觀了這座城市所有著名的歷史地標。

example: The departure time for our train to the capital city is scheduled for 8:30 AM from Platform 4.
example_zh: 我們前往首都的火車出發時間定於早上 8 點 30 分，從 4 號月台發車。

example: Our detailed itinerary includes important meetings on Monday and sightseeing activities starting Tuesday morning.
example_zh: 我們詳細的行程計畫包括週一的重點會議和從週二早上開始的觀光活動。

example: Check your class schedule carefully so you don't miss the morning lecture.
example_zh: 仔細查看你的課程表，以免錯過早上的講座。

example: The history professor gave us a challenging reading assignment for the weekend.
example_zh: 歷史學教授給了我們一份有挑戰性的週末閱讀作業。

example: Our university campus is very beautiful, with large green spaces and modern buildings.
example_zh: 我們大學的校園非常漂亮，有大片的綠地和現代化的建築。

example: If you want to take the advanced course, you must enroll before the deadline next Friday.
example_zh: 如果你想參加進階課程，必須在下週五截止日期前註冊。

example: All students must wear their school uniform correctly when they attend classes.
example_zh: 所有學生在上課時都必須正確穿著學校制服。

example: I need to finish this small task before I leave the office today.
example_zh: 我今天離開辦公室前需要完成這個小任務。

example: Learning how to manage your time effectively is key to success at work.
example_zh: 學習如何有效地管理時間是在工作中成功的關鍵。

example: We usually have team meetings in the main conference room of the new office.
example_zh: 我們通常在新辦公室的主要會議室開團隊會議。

example: Always maintain a professional attitude when communicating with clients.
example_zh: 與客戶溝通時，務必保持專業的態度。

example: We must submit the final project report by the strict deadline next Friday.
example_zh: 我們必須在下週五的嚴格截止日期前提交最終專案報告。

example: The most common symptom of the flu is a high fever and body aches.
example_zh: 流感最常見的症狀是高燒和全身痠痛。

example: Doctors recommend that you exercise regularly to manage your stress better.
example_zh: 醫生建議您定期運動以更好地管理壓力。

example: Learning about basic nutrition helps you make healthier food choices every day.
example_zh: 學習基礎營養學能幫助您每天做出更健康的食物選擇。

example: She needed two weeks off work to fully recover from the minor surgery.
example_zh: 她需要兩週的假期才能從這個小手術中完全康復。

example: Getting enough sleep is crucial if you want to keep your immune system healthy.
example_zh: 如果您想保持免疫系統健康，充足的睡眠至關重要。

example: Did you enjoy your weekend? I heard you were planning a short trip to the coast.
example_zh: 你的週末過得愉快嗎？我聽說你計畫要去海邊做個短途旅行。

example: How long is your daily commute to the office, especially when there is heavy traffic?
example_zh: 你每天通勤到辦公室要花多久時間，特別是遇到交通壅塞的時候？

example: We had a terrific time at the corporate event last night; the food was excellent.
example_zh: 我們昨晚在公司活動上玩得很開心；食物非常棒。

example: I need to check my schedule before I can confirm the time for our meeting tomorrow afternoon.
example_zh: 我需要確認一下我的行程表，才能確認我們明天下午的會議時間。

example: It's been months since we last talked; we should grab lunch soon and catch up.
example_zh: 我們上次談話已經是好幾個月前了；我們應該找時間一起吃午餐敘舊。

example: Make sure you keep the receipt in case you need to return the item.
example_zh: 務必保留收據，以防你需要退還該商品。

example: I need to prioritize finishing this major task before starting anything new.
example_zh: 在開始任何新事物之前，我需要優先完成這項主要任務。

example: After working twelve hours straight, she was too exhausted to cook dinner.
example_zh: 連續工作十二小時後，她累得筋疲力盡，沒辦法煮晚餐。

example: I have to run a few errands this afternoon, like going to the bank and the grocery store.
example_zh: 我今天下午必須跑幾個腿，像是去銀行和雜貨店。

example: Please confirm your appointment time by replying to the reminder email.
example_zh: 請回覆提醒電子郵件，以確認您的預約時間。

example: We need to book our flight and hotel accommodations before the end of the month.
example_zh: 我們需要在月底前預訂我們的機票和酒店住宿。

example: Guests must check in at the front desk before receiving their room key.
example_zh: 客人在拿到房卡前必須在前台辦理入住手續。

example: Please make sure your luggage is tagged correctly before you proceed to the gate.
example_zh: 請確保您的行李已正確貼上標籤，然後再前往登機門。

example: Our final destination is Paris, but we have a short layover in Amsterdam.
example_zh: 我們的最終目的地是巴黎，但我們在阿姆斯特丹有一個短暫的中途停留。

example: The guided tour made our visit to the ancient ruins truly memorable for everyone.
example_zh: 這次導覽行程讓我們的古蹟參觀對每個人來說都非常難忘。

example: I need to check my class schedule before registering for the elective course.
example_zh: 在註冊選修課之前，我需要查看我的課程表。

example: You must enroll in the university by the end of August to secure your spot.
example_zh: 你必須在八月底前註冊大學，以確保你的名額。

example: The new library is located on the north side of the main campus.
example_zh: 新圖書館位於主校園的北側。

example: Please submit your final history assignment before the deadline next Friday.
example_zh: 請在下週五截止日期之前提交你們的期末歷史作業。

example: Students are encouraged to actively participate in class discussions to improve speaking skills.
example_zh: 鼓勵學生積極參與課堂討論，以提高口語技能。

example: We will discuss the starting salary during the second interview next week.
example_zh: 我們將在下週的第二次面試中討論起始薪資。

example: Please send the agenda before the team meeting starts this afternoon.
example_zh: 請在今天下午的團隊會議開始前寄出議程。

example: I decided to apply for the new marketing position at the company.
example_zh: 我決定申請公司裡那個新的行銷職位。

example: The deadline for submitting the final project report is Friday.
example_zh: 提交最終專案報告的截止日期是週五。

example: Remember to leave your key at the front office before you go home today.
example_zh: 記得在今天回家前把鑰匙留在前台辦公室。

example: If you have serious flu symptoms, you should stay home and rest.
example_zh: 如果你有嚴重的流感症狀，你應該待在家休息。

example: It took him two weeks to fully recover from the surgery.
example_zh: 他花了兩週才從手術中完全康復。

example: Good nutrition is necessary for children's growth and development.
example_zh: 良好的營養對於兒童的成長和發展是必需的。

example: Regular physical exercise helps maintain a healthy weight.
example_zh: 定期的體能運動有助於保持健康的體重。

example: Washing your hands frequently helps prevent the spread of germs.
example_zh: 勤洗手有助於預防病菌傳播。

example: I've been really busy preparing for the quarterly report this week.
example_zh: 我這週一直忙著準備季度報告。

example: We should catch up soon and discuss the progress of the new project.
example_zh: 我們應該找時間敘敘舊，並討論新專案的進度。

example: We often talk about our hometowns during lunch breaks to find common interests.
example_zh: 我們經常在午休時聊起家鄉，以尋找共同的興趣。

example: How do you manage to get so much work done before the deadline?
example_zh: 你是如何設法在截止日期前完成這麼多工作的？

example: Did you enjoy the conference yesterday? I thought the main speaker was excellent.
example_zh: 你喜歡昨天的會議嗎？我覺得主講人很棒。
